name: WDesignKit – Elementor & Gutenberg Starter Templates, Patterns, Cloud Workspace & Widget Builder
author: POSIMYTH

sections.description:
WDesignKit is the ultimate designer tool for WordPress, empowering designers to create stunning websites in minutes. It’s the fastest way to build a WordPress website, making it a must-have tool for every WordPress designer or agency owner.

VISIT WDESIGNKIT WEBSITE

Quick Navigation Links

Visit Website | Video Tutorials| Documentations | Roadmap | Join Facebook Community | Free Support | Premium Support | AI Chat (Instant Answers)

What is WDesignKit ?

  • 1000+ Elementor Page Templates, Kit & Sections
  • 1000+ Gutenberg Templates & Patterns
  • 50+ Elementor Widgets Library
  • 50+ Gutenberg Blocks Library
  • 50+ Bricks Elements Libary
  • Elementor Widget Builder (Custom Code to Elementor Widget)
  • Gutenberg Blocks Builder(Custom Code to Gutenberg Blocks)
  • Bricks Elements Builder (Custom Code to Bricks Elements)
  • 1- Click Widget Convertor ‚Äî Easily Convert Elementor Widgets to Gutenberg Blocks or Bricks Elements & Vice Versa
  • Cloud Workspace ‚Äî Collaborate with your Team & Store Page Templates, Figma Designs or Custom Widgets on Cloud
  • 200+ Figma Designed Websites

WDesignKit Replace Mulitple Plugins & Tools for You

  • Starter Templates ‚Äî Elementor, WordPress & Beaver Builder Templates
  • AI Powered Starter Templates by Kadence WP
  • Toolkit for Block Theme (Starter Templates, Portfolio, Gutenberg Blocks, Patterns) ‚Äì Twentig
  • Templately ‚Äì Gutenberg & Elementor Template Library: 5000+ Free & Pro Ready Templates & Cloud!
  • Unlimited Elements for Elementor
  • Envato & Themeforest Marketplace
  • Templete Monster
  • And Much More

üîç OUR PRODUCTS

ü•á The Plus Addons for Elementor – 120+ Elementor Widgets to create Elementor Widgets Easily.

ü•á NexterWP Theme, Blocks & Extensions – Best Starter Theme for WordPress with 22+ WordPress Extension & 90+ Gutenberg Blocks.

ü•á UiChemy – Figma to Elementor & Bricks Convertor – Convert your Figma Templates In Live Elementor Website using our FREE Figma Plugin.

ü•á WDesignKit – 1000+ Elementor Template, Elementor Widget Builder, Widget Convertor to Block, Bricks, Cloud Template & Widget Storage & more.
sections.faq:
Does with Work with Any WordPress Theme?

Yes this works with all the Theme, but it works best in sync with our Nexter WordPress Theme.

Is Widget Builder free to use?

Yes. Our Elementor Widget Builder, & Bricks Elements Builder & Upcoming Gutenberg Blocks builder and future Builders will be 100% free to use. There are some limitations on the number of widgets you can create in the free plan.

Can I save templates from both Elementor Free and Pro using WDesignKit?

Yes, You can save and use Elementor Free and Pro both templates.

What page builders are currently supported with WDesignKit?

Currently, for Templates, We are having support for Elementor and Gutenberg. In Widget builder & Ready made widgets, We are supporting Elementor. Gutenberg, Bricks, and more coming very soon.

Do i Need any Elementor Addon to use the Plugin?

WDesignKit does not have any direct dependency on any Elementor Addon, but some Elementor Templates & Gutenberg Blocks required The Plus Addons for Elementor or Nexter Blocks for full import of website.

How can I report security bugs?

You can report security bugs through the Patchstack Vulnerability Disclosure Program. The Patchstack team help validate, triage and handle any security vulnerabilities. Report a security vulnerability.
